burst_search.preprocess¶

Preprocessing data for fast radio burst searches.

This module contains, bandpass calibration, RFI flagging, etc.

Functions¶

remove_periodic(data, period) Remove periodic time compenent from data.
remove_noisy_freq(data, sigma_threshold) Flag frequency channels with high variance.
noisecal_bandpass(data, cal_spectrum, cal_period) Remove noise-cal and use to bandpass calibrate.
remove_outliers(data, sigma_threshold) Flag outliers within frequency channels.
remove_continuum(data) Calculates a contiuum template and removes it from the data.
